title: Help i cant forge with my chaos tokens
body: Every time i try to forge something with my chaos tokens it just goes back to the default crafting screen. YES i restarted my client. yes i waited a day... in fact i waited a week because i couldn't deal with it before. PLEASE HELP!

replies.body: That no good! Those tokens are still able to be crafted into those event icons and items, so your client may just be having a hard time getting that specific screen to open for a couple of different reasons. Let's start with going through this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) making sure to hit each step. Hit me back up afterward and let me know if that fixed your hextech loot or not!
I'm going to be honest with you. i did not expect that to work. but it did. thank you
